# AsyncMessagesReturn

## <ApiType type="Class" path="prompt_templates/decorator/AsyncMessagesReturn" symbolName="AsyncMessagesReturn" /> AsyncMessagesReturn

Protocol for a prompt template function that returns a list of messages.
